column1: #text=I drove to the grocery store , parked , and went into the building .
#text=There was a line of shopping carts at the front of the store , just inside the doors .
#text=I took one and walked to the wide produce aisle at the left of the store .
#text=I walked down every aisle in the store , adding things to my cart as I did .
#text=I had a shopping list with me and managed to find everything I needed .
#text=I bought material for making a big salad for dinner : lettuce , tomatoes , peppers , cucumbers , and croutons .
#text=And I bought two packages of chicken and one package of hamburg .
#text=I also bought things like paper towels and toilet paper and frozen food .
#text=When I was finished adding items to my cart , I walked to one of the registers .
#text=There are more than twenty registers in the store .
#text=I chose the one with the shortest line .
#text=When it was my turn I put the things I had in my cart onto the conveyor belt .
#text=The woman at the cash register scanned the items , and a man at the end of the counter put my items in plastic bags .
#text=When she was finished scanning my order , she told me how much I owed .
#text=I swiped my credit card into the machine .
#text=The machine approved my card , and I signed the machine with a special pen .
#text=The bagger had finished bagging my items by then and had put all the bags in my shopping cart .
#text=I left the store to put the bags in my car .
